message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start negotiations.
I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $9,000 is quite low, but I understand you're looking for a fair deal.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $12,500?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $12,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,250. Can we make a deal at that price?
